General.Name: G Collado S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: G Collado, S.A.B. de C.V. engages in the processing, sale, and distribution of value-added steel products in Mexico. It offers flat steels products, such as cold, galvanized, and painted sheets; hot rolled sheets and plates; industrial pipes; commercial profiles, including hearth, angles, squares, round, and structural profiles; beam and channels; rods; corrugated and galvanized wires; and derivatives, bars, aluminum, and stainless steel. The company was founded in 1949 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
